name: Doukutsu Demake
description:
A little (Pico8-sized) project my brother and I have been working on. We are huge Cave Story fans, so building a demake was kind of a childhood dream come true. It never ceases to amaze me how much can be done within the (wonderful self-imposed) limitations of the Pico-8 engine.

It has no real ending as-of-now, we might add that in later. But for now, enjoy! If you want to see some of our process in creating this, we vlogged about it at DoubtfulGames

Controls

  • Arrow Keys: Move
  • Down Arrow Key: Interact
  • Z: Jump
  • X: Shoot (once you find a weapon)
